verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I was straying when Christ found me In the night so dark and cold; Tenderly His arm went around me, And He bore me to His fold.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Precious hiding place, Precious hiding place, In the shelter of His love; Not a doubt or fear, Since my Lord is near, And I'm sheltered in His love.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: With His nail-scarred hand He bro't me To the shelter of His love; Of His grace and will He taught me, And of heav'nly rest above.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Tho' the night be dark around me I am safe, for He is near; Never shall my foes confound me, While the Savior's voice I hear.
